Class TextButton

java.lang.Object
  TextButton

public class TextButton
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class used to draw Strings to the screen.

Author:
Reed Weichler

public TextButton(java.lang.String str,
                  java.awt.Font font,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  java.awt.Color color,
                  java.awt.Color highlight)
Creates a new TextButton with the specified attributes

Parameters:
str - text to be displayed
font - font of text
x - the very left part of the text
y - the top part of the text
color - default color
highlight - color when the mouse hovers over
